name: Class RTFEditorKit
text:
This is the default implementation of RTF editing
 functionality.  The RTF support was not written by the
 Swing team.  In the future we hope to improve the support
 provided.

methods.description:
Get the MIME type of the data that this
 kit represents support for.  This kit supports
 the type text/rtf.

methods.method_sig:
public void read (InputStream in,
                 Document doc,
                 int pos)
          throws IOException,
                 BadLocationException
methods.description:
Insert content from the given stream which is expected
 to be in a format appropriate for this kind of content
 handler.

methods.method_sig:
public void write (OutputStream out,
                  Document doc,
                  int pos,
                  int len)
           throws IOException,
                  BadLocationException
methods.description:
Write content from a document to the given stream
 in a format appropriate for this kind of content handler.

methods.method_sig:
public void read (Reader in,
                 Document doc,
                 int pos)
          throws IOException,
                 BadLocationException
methods.description:
Insert content from the given stream, which will be
 treated as plain text.

methods.method_sig:
public void write (Writer out,
                  Document doc,
                  int pos,
                  int len)
           throws IOException,
                  BadLocationException
methods.description:
Write content from a document to the given stream
 as plain text.
